plot: Mr. Nice Guy is a nice guy, so he should get to heaven. Or will he? Has he really kept the ten commandments?
title: Are You a Good Person?
plot_es: Mr. Nice Guy is a nice guy, so he should get to heaven. Or will he? Has he really kept the ten commandments?
plot_en: Mr. Nice Guy is a nice guy, so he should get to heaven. Or will he? Has he really kept the ten commandments?
